values.NEWEST_FIRST: Sort notes in reverse chronological order starting with the last created note.
values.LAST_UPDATED: Sort notes in reverse chronological order starting with the last updated note.
values.GUIDE_STEPS: Sort notes by their guide and guide steps, if any, from first to last. All notes from a guide are sorted together, even if non-guide notes were made inbetween. Notes without a guide are sorted around the guide notes, using OLDEST_FIRST.
